= Introduction =

A simple browser based hosts manager.

= Details =

Usage:
{{{
wget http://hatter-source-code.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/hostsmanager/ hostsmanager.jar
java -jar hostsmanager.jar [-Dport=NNN]
}}}

Then open browser and enjoy it.
